Test Name: Branched-Chain Amino Acids (Leucine, Isoleucine, Valine), Blood Spot
Purpose: To accurately quantify branched-chain amino acids (leucine, isoleucine, valine) for clinical assessment and decision-making.
Container: Blood spot filter paper collection card
Equipment: High-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) or tandem mass spectrometry (MS/MS) system
